overview:
Edward is Managing Partner of Longbow focusing on investment activity and ongoing support for portfolio companies. He has advised on, participated in or led investments into over twenty early stage companies across a broad range of sectors. He is non executive director of Cyden Ltd, DTV Group Ltd and Direct Health Ltd.

Edward has undertaken a wide range of venture capital, project finance and investment initiatives including food, drink and medical supplies in Russia during the early 1990s, and the acquisition and development of leisure businesses in the UK.
